content: get ready to crochet the cutest chubby cat amigurumi with our free pattern this chubby feline is sure to melt your heart with its charm and cuddliness whether you re a beginner or an experienced crocheter this pattern is perfect for you let s start stitching and bring this lovable kitty to life **materials** * cotton vietnam yarn 1 0mm * crochet hook 2 75 3mm * fiberfill sewing needle scissors **permitted use** * you can sell items made from these patterns/tutorial videos a small quantity of fewer than **50 products/month** provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling ** pattern by ami saigon * https //amisaigon vn/ 3 * thank you so much for purchasing the pattern i would love to see your ﬁnished doll so please share a the picture with me tag me **@amisaigonvn** and use the hashtag #amisaigonvn #amisaigon on instagram * let us know if you have a specific question or give an idea of what you re looking for we re happy to make recommendations **check out our other products** * https //shop amiguworld com/ 4 ## **contact** ## *contact us via email* amisaigonshop@gmail com ⁠ᵔ⁠ᴥ⁠ᵔ⁠ 3 https //amisaigon vn/ 4 https //shop amiguworld com/
